EmailTemplate.description: Designed to appear more personal and the least system-generated, use this text email template to inform the customer that there is new correspondence on the Case. Includes the most recent public comment, the name of the user who submitted the comment, the 25 most recent public comments, and the Case Number, Status, and Priority Level.
EmailTemplate.name: New Comment Personal (text)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case {!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject}
